column2:
Hm-?
Oh, please don't attack me.
I don't have any intention to fight.

old:
――あら
魔物のわたしが話すのが珍しいですか？
column2: Oh, do you find it unusual for a monster like me to speak?

old:
ハーピーは歌が命ですから声は出せるのですが
人間の言葉を覚えるかどうかは、それぞれですね
わたしはジンゲンに近い所で育ちましたから
column2:
I grew up near Jingen, so I know Harpies can sing, so they can have a voice.
I'm not sure if they can learn human language or not.

old:

あとで狩りにいかないと
column2: I'm getting hungry. I have to go hunting later.
